attributes.action: Close All Education Centres, Work Places and Ban Large Gatherings, Immediately.
attributes.additional_details: This needs to be done immediately to safeguard the UK population. It's recommended action from experts world wide.
attributes.background: Stop the spread of Covid-19, act while the UK numbers are in their hundreds.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petition calling for the same actions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301439
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300885
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300403
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300628

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
